title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate embeddings, pull models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs, streaming and embedding methods.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to Ollama generate/chat endpoints with streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust, offering model switching, chat history and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container image and compose examples for running Ollama server plus optional CUDA runtime.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of recipes: function-calling, vision, embeddings, fine-tuning and LangChain samples.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Streamlit app template for document Q&A using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-kt
summary: Lightweight Kotlin multiplatform client for Ollama targeting JVM, Android and iOS.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings and dependency-injection friendly setup.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses in chat, supports slash commands and custom system prompts.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for summarization, translation and note Q&A inside vault.
